inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure service connection for the Blueprints task. This can be an Azure Management Group or Subscription. By default, this is the location at which the Blueprint is stored. If selecting a Management Group, an alternate subscription location can be specified for the Blueprint.

inputs.name: ParametersFile
inputs.label: Parameters File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.

inputs.name: AlternateLocation
inputs.label: The Blueprint is also stored at this subscription.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates that the Blueprint is stored at the provided subscription and not the parent management group.
